content: pattern across needles #1 and #2 and the first 5 5 6 stitches on needle #3 you should have 14 16 18 stitches left on needle #3 heel flap on a new dp needle with the solid color knit the 14 16 18 stitches left on needle #3 and the first 14 16 18 stitches on needle #1 leaving 5 5 6 stitches on needle #1 do not cut the other yarns you may wish to cap off the two dp needles with only 5 or 6 stitches on each with a point cap or a rubber band to prevent the stitches from falling off the needles or put them on stitch holders these 28 32 36 stitches will become your heel flap 7 turn the work around and slip 1 stitch and purl across turn and slip 1 knit 1 to the end continue these two row until you have knit 2 25 2 5 2 75 inches or desired heel flap length ending with a purl row 8 to turn the heel slip 1 stitch knit 14 16 18 stitches ssk knit 1 and turn slip 1 purl 3 purl 2tog purl 1 turn slip 1 and knit until 1 stitch before gap ssk knit 1 turn continue until all stitches are used up you should have 16 18 20 stitches left on the needle cut the yarn leaving a tail to weave in 9 look at the dp that has 5 5 6 stitches on it to the right of the heel flap there should be yarn hanging at the end of the 5 5 6 stitches place a stitch marker to the left of these stitches then with that needle and yarn pick up desired number of stitches along right side of heel flap and knit 8 9 10 stitches from the heel with a new dp needle but the same yarn knit across 8 9 10 stitches pick up same number of stitches along left side of heel flap place a stitch marker and knit the 5 5 6 stitches on the next dp needle 10 gusset continue in the same manner as in #5 except that when you get to the next stitch marker k1 ssk then continue until 3 stitches before next stitch marker and k2tog k1 continue in this manner decreasing every other row until there are 19 21 24 stitches left on each of the two needles with the stitch markers then remove the stitch markers and continue until 2 inches shorter than desired foot length ending at the original starting point cut the yarns 11 toe with solid color knit 11 13 15 k2tog k1 with new dp k1 ssk knit 11 13 15 with new dp knit 11 13 15 k2tog k1 and with new dp k1 ssk knit 11 13 15 continue to shape toe decreasing every other row until there are 7 8 9 stitches on each dp then decrease every row until a total of 16
